creator: dolfsmits@zonnet.nl
text:
It seems that the normal escape character (\) which is needed for escaping 
illegal characters in a distinghuished name, is not working properly.
it seems that some parsing somewhere is already removing the escape character 
before the request is sent to the ldap server.
This happens with all nightly builds where the extended ldap sampler is added.

A workaround is to add more escape characters eg. to add a backslash into a 
distinghuised name, for backslashes are needed, eg cn=c:\\\\test.log,ou=files
to add an entry with the name cn=c:\test.log,ou=files.
